bug.author: znation
bug.summary: mxnet < 1.4.0 brings in an unsupported requests version
bug.description: Current mxnet versions (prior to 1.4) bring in a version of requests that is unsupported and has reported vulnerabilities. We should upgrade our max dependency to 1.4.0 to fix this.

comments.comment: We should also take out the requests dependency that the coremltools source drop brought in. This one is not even used anywhere.
